gamerule.mementomori:cureAllItems.descri: Controls whether players can cure themselves without weakness by using items in the cure-alls tag.
gamerule.mementomori:attritionGrowth.des: Controls whether attrition will grow over time while possessing a mob.
gamerule.mementomori:attritionTime.descr: Controls the amount of time players have attrition for (in seconds).
gamerule.mementomori:blastResistantUnpha: Controls whether players can phase through blocks with a blast resistance of obsidian or higher.
gamerule.mementomori:soulDamageDeathLeve: Attrition level soul damage kills at
Controls the level at which any amount of soul damage will kill the player. Putting -1 will disable this feature.
gamerule.mementomori:phantomSpawnCount.d: Controls the amount of phantoms that spawn per level of attrition. Putting 0 will disable this feature.
